frustumAxis.description: Axis along which the frustum is positioned, in the local frame defined by the pose information (the axis is pointing from the frustum apex toward its base)

fov.description: Field of view, in degrees. If the aspect ratio is also provided, this is the horizontal field of view of a pyramidal frustum, otherwise the frustum is conical

aspectRatio.description: Aspect ratio of the frustum base rectangle, that is the ratio of its width to its height (unitless)

length.description: Length of the frustum, in meters
